Himitsu no Akko-chan (Movie):
Taisho's father plans to construct an apartment building on a vacant land he owns behind his own house. The spot is a playing field for the kids in the neighborhood who will fight to keep it as it is.

(Source: ANN)
['Himitsu no Akko-chan 2', 'Himitsu no Akko-chan: Umi da! Obake da!! Natsu Matsuri']
